meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>explanation</kanji> (説明) in <kanji>writing</kanji> is a <vocabulary>written explanation</vocabulary>. I guess sometimes you don't want to do your explanations in person, huh?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
